page.title: 04OPINIONS
page.content: {The Village Shop and Post Office}could be under threat because the new commuters have little need for these facilities.Many worry thet there is no work in the area and that{travelling} is awkward and expensive.Many object to any industry except some rural crafts.The area has suffered from { {acid rain pollution}from the adjoining industrial areas indicated by the partly barren moorland but local people feel that because of the demise of the textile and engineering industry there is less acid rain on the moors.{Harrier Jets}flying low over the area cause some alarm.The area suffers from occasional vandalism burglary and the influx of many {motor {bike scramblers}who have little respect for the environment
